function.name: dishWashing_start
function.description: This function is used to start the dishwashing function on a specified SmartThings dishwasher.

location.description: The location where the dishwasher is located.

room.description: The room where the dishwasher is located.

device.description: The name of the dishwasher on which the dishwashing function needs to be started.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment of the dishwasher on which the dishwashing function needs to be started.
